game.name: Battle Squares
game.categories: 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Channel your 4 corners and start aiming — it's time to fight! Battle Squares is a fast-paced, online 2D shooter with 8-directional chaos and colorful, corner-fueled mayhem.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Channel your 4 corners and start aiming — it's time to fight! Battle Squares is a fast-paced, online 2D shooter with 8-directional chaos and colorful, corner-fueled mayhem.
